fields.title: Classic Orange Juice
fields.description: A refreshing and classic orange juice made from fresh oranges.
fields.instructions:
1. Cut the oranges in half.
2. Squeeze the juice using a juicer.
3. Strain the juice to remove pulp if desired.
4. Add honey if you prefer a sweeter taste.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Green Detox Juice
fields.description: A nutrient-packed green detox juice with kale, spinach, and cucumber.
fields.ingredients: 1 cucumber, 2 cups kale, 1 cup spinach, 1 lemon, 1 apple, 1 inch ginger
fields.instructions:
1. Wash all ingredients thoroughly.
2. Chop the cucumber, apple, and ginger into smaller pieces.
3. Add all ingredients to a juicer.
4. Juice until smooth.
5. Serve immediately.

fields.title: Berry Blast Smoothie
fields.description: A delicious and antioxidant-rich berry smoothie.
fields.ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup blueberries, 1 cup raspberries, 1 banana, 1 cup almond milk
fields.instructions:
1. Wash all berries thoroughly.
2. Peel the banana.
3. Add all ingredients to a blender.
4. Blend until smooth.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Tropical Mango Juice
fields.description: An exotic and sweet mango juice.
fields.ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes, 1 cup coconut water, 1 tbsp lime juice
fields.instructions:
1. Peel and chop the mangoes.
2. Add mangoes and coconut water to a blender.
3. Blend until smooth.
4. Stir in lime juice.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Refreshing Lemonade
fields.instructions:
1. Squeeze the lemons to extract the juice.
2. In a pitcher, combine lemon juice, sugar, and water.
3. Stir until the sugar is dissolved.
4. Serve over ice.

fields.title: Apple Ginger Juice
fields.description: A zesty and healthy apple ginger juice.
fields.ingredients: 4 apples, 1 inch ginger, 1 tbsp lemon juice
fields.instructions:
1. Wash and chop the apples.
2. Peel and slice the ginger.
3. Add apples and ginger to the juicer.
4. Juice and add lemon juice.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Carrot Orange Juice
fields.description: A vitamin-rich carrot and orange juice.
fields.instructions:
1. Wash and chop the carrots.
2. Peel the oranges.
3. Add all ingredients to the juicer.
4. Juice and serve immediately.

fields.title: Cucumber Mint Juice
fields.instructions:
1. Wash and chop the cucumbers.
2. Add cucumbers and mint to the juicer.
3. Juice and add lemon juice.
4. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Beetroot Apple Juice
fields.description: A vibrant and healthy beetroot apple juice.
fields.instructions:
1. Wash and peel the beetroots.
2. Chop the apples and ginger.
3. Add all ingredients to the juicer.
4. Juice and serve chilled.

fields.title: Pineapple Coconut Juice
fields.ingredients: 1 pineapple, 1 cup coconut water, 1 tbsp lime juice
fields.instructions:
1. Peel and chop the pineapple.
2. Add pineapple and coconut water to the blender.
3. Blend until smooth.
4. Stir in lime juice.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Spinach Banana Smoothie
fields.description: A healthy and creamy spinach banana smoothie.
fields.ingredients: 2 bananas, 1 cup spinach, 1 cup almond milk, 1 tbsp honey
fields.instructions:
1. Peel the bananas.
2. Add bananas, spinach, and almond milk to the blender.
3. Blend until smooth.
4. Add honey if desired.
5. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Strawberry Lemonade
fields.description: A sweet and tangy strawberry lemonade.
fields.ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 4 lemons, 1 cup sugar, 6 cups water
fields.instructions:
1. Squeeze the lemons to extract the juice.
2. Blend strawberries until smooth.
3. In a pitcher, combine lemon juice, strawberry puree, sugar, and water.
4. Stir until sugar is dissolved.
5. Serve over ice.

fields.title: Watermelon Cooler
fields.description: A cool and refreshing watermelon drink.
fields.instructions:
1. Chop the watermelon into cubes.
2. Blend the watermelon until smooth.
3. Add lime juice and honey.
4. Serve chilled over ice.

fields.title: Peach Iced Tea
fields.description: A sweet and refreshing peach iced tea.
fields.ingredients: 4 peaches, 4 tea bags, 1 cup sugar, 6 cups water
fields.instructions:
1. Brew the tea and let it cool.
2. Blend peaches until smooth.
3. In a pitcher, combine tea, peach puree, and sugar.
4. Stir until sugar is dissolved.
5. Serve over ice.

fields.title: Mango Banana Smoothie
fields.description: A tropical and creamy mango banana smoothie.
fields.ingredients: 1 ripe mango, 2 bananas, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 tbsp honey
fields.instructions:
1. Peel and chop the mango.
2. Peel the bananas.
3. Add mango, bananas, and coconut milk to the blender.
4. Blend until smooth.
5. Serve chilled.
